ResearchProjectDef.label: Screwball generator
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harness the power of a pony supposedly cursed by the Lord of Chaos for your own needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plushie recycling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn new techniques which allow you to turn plushies back into 60% of the cloth used to make them. Also allows you to recover 10% of the gold used to make Elements of Harmony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cure poison joke addiction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to use herbal medicine to cure a person of an addiction to poison joke.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rainbow Laser
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create weapons that smite your enemies with the power of rainbows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Statues of the Evil Sisters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to construct a statue of Nightmare Moon, who will grant you exotic items in exchange for chocolate, as well as a statue of Daybreaker, who will convert 100 of one material (or 1000 silver) into its market value equivalent of another.
